DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study assess safety tolerability AZD3043 follow administration single ascend bolus dos ( Part A ) single ascend bolus dos follow infusion ( Part B ) .
DOC.brief_title: Study Assess Safety , Tolerability , Pharmacokinetics Pharmacodynamics AZD3043
DOC.criteria: Subjects suitable vein cannulation repeat venepuncture Predose assessment judge without remark investigator Have body mass index ( BMI ) 18 30 kg/m2 weigh least 50 kg 100 kg Abnormal vital sign , 15 minute supine rest , define follow : Systolic blood pressure > 140 mm Hg Diastolic blood pressure > 90 mm Hg Heart rate â‰¤45 > 85 beat per minute Lack normal phenotype BuChE ( Butyrylcholinesterase )
